casebody.data:
IN RE GUARDIANSHIP OF James R. BECKER, Sr., an incapacitated person. James Becker, Jr., as personal representative of the Estate of James R. Becker, Sr., deceased, Appellant,
v.
Mary Fluharty, as guardian of James R. Becker, Sr., an incapacitated person, Appellee. Case No. 2D15-4854 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed December 20, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
